name: Benefice
description:
Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43. All art, sound, music and game code was produced solo, from scratch, for the compo.

Benefice was written in Kotlin using the wonderful LibGDX game development framework. Visuals were lovingly hand-crafted in Aseprite. Music was composed in Propellerhead Reason 7, with BFXR for sound.
